Text:
Är dom från TV utsändningen eller rippade från DVDs?

Tack!

Hej cdomeij!

Stort tack för att du lagt upp hela Fassbinders verk.Hoppas på att du har bra lina.Och att vi alla som tankar här hjälps åt.

Än en gång. STORT TACK

Nooooooooooooooooooooooooo.
I have been waiting for this ALL MY LIFE! Only Swedish subs??? I'm going to kill myself. Does anyone know how I can get English subtitles for this? Please help!
And by the way: thanks to cdomeij for the best upload ever

Have just watched part 1, and this has to be one of the most boring movies I have ever seen. I like a lot of european (and scandinavian) dramas, but this is not one of them. But thanks for sharing cdomeij!

So, if you don't know what this is, download just part 1 and check it out yourself. You may like it, and you may not...

BTW, it is a TV-Rip (SVT).

fantastic!
Have been waiting for this. I have no recordable dvd-player and didn't want to get up in the middle of the night to change video tapes..spoiled as I am with dvd-quality. THanks!

Abstracta!
What did you search for when you landed on this torrent - and then downloaded it?!
Seems like you just want to cram your harddiscs full; because you havent been serious doing a search for either Fassbinder nor Berlin Alexanderplatz.
This is a masterpiece!
Thank's for uploading!
It would be very nice to get a seed on this. Can anyone please help? Thank you very much.
